title: Sri Lanka bank net foreign assets rise to US$1.7bn in March, OBUs US$2.2bn
byline: Banks build dollar balances with after SLDB repayments in rupees and ISB provisions

title: Sri Lanka rupee opens flat, bond yields steady
byline: An auction of Rs. 175,000 million Treasury bills was ongoing.

title: Sri Lanka to buy 16 waste transport compactor trucks
byline: To formalize collection and transport of waste in selected local government bodies

title: Sri Lanka awards airport contract to Netherland's Haskoning
byline: Consultancy firm to prepare the master plan for the Bandaranaike International Airport.

title: Sri Lanka regulator approves 15-pct tariff hike
byline: "We think it's fair" PUCSL chairman K P L Chandralal told reporters.

title: Sri Lanka, Australia to boost police cooperation
byline: Cabinet approves signing an MoU with Australia to facilitate cooperation between the two countries' police forces
